DOC.brief_summary: Open , parallel group design . The study screen phase 12 week treatment phase . Subjects randomise treatment 1:1 ration .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Flutiform® pMDI Adult Patients With Mild Moderate-severe Reversible Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve 12 week treatment phase . During treatment phase subject receive FLUTIFORM® Sertetide® . Efficacy assess lung function test asthma symptom , sleep disturbance . Safety assess adverse event , vital sign , lab test ECGs .
